North Korea Claims Test of ‘Super-Large Multiple Rocket Launchers’ Link: /national-security/2019/11/02/north-korea-claims-test-of-super-large-multiple-rocket-launchers/

North Korea claimed to conduct a test of “super-large multiple rocket launchers” on Thursday afternoon, state news propaganda outlet KCNA announced on Friday.

Chinese Catholics Say Vatican-China Accord Fuels Christian Persecution Link: /asia/2019/11/02/chinese-catholics-say-vatican-china-accord-fuels-christian-persecution/

A number of the Chinese Catholic faithful have expressed regret over the Vatican agreement with the Chinese Communist government, saying it has emboldened officials in their persecution of Christians.

Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D. Link: /author/thomas-d-williams/
